TopicTitle: Is there any mod that lets me do this?

Articles.Content:
I have a hitchiker storage part in my rocket, and lets say it has 3 slots for Kerbals, is there any mod that lets the Hitchiker Storage part to come with the kerbals already inside it, so i don't have to bring more from other ships?

Edited November 1, 2014 by Unknow0059

I have a hitchiker storage part in my rocket, and lets say it has 3 slots for Kerbals, is there any mod that lets the Hitchiker Storage part to come with the kerbals already inside it, so i don't have to bring more from other ships?

Go to the Crew tab in the VAB, and just drag Kerbals into the Hitchhiker. No mods required.

I know of at least three options:

1: As described by Starman you can add additional crrew from the VAB/SPH.

2: Load the ship by clicking either the runway of launchpad from the space center screen.

3: Use a mod like Crew Manifest.
